name: Raptr Dark Lens
description: A dark translucent layered theme for raptr. Leaves the background picture alone.
css:
/* @name Raptr Dark Lens */

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("raptr.com"){

.mod-community-carousel .selected .boxart-wrapper,
.mod-your-stats .bd,
.mod-game-list .bd,
.mod-recent-achievements .bd,
.mod-community-feed .hd .filter-box,
.mod-recently-played .game-head-container,
.button-icon:hover,
#page_foot .mod-page-foot,
.mod-filter .bd .bd,
.mod-major > .hd > .tab-control li.active,
.pagination-bar,
.mod-community-carousel .bd,
.layout-container .gradient-box:before,
.mod-community-comments .topbar,
.mod-community-comments .comment-sort,
.feed-items .image-embed a,
.mod-site-search .footer a,
.mod-top-games .hd,
.mod-standard > .hd > .tab-control li.active,
.feed-items .video  {
    background-image: none !important;
    background: none !important;
    background-color: transparent !important;
}
.mod-profile-about,
.layout-container .gradient-box:before {
    border: none !important;
}
.friend-list .friend-actions {
    box-shadow: none !important;
}
#page-head,
#doc > .bd,
.layout-nav,
.region,
.layout-content,
.region-child,
.mod-recently-played .game-head-container .more-info-container,
.region-child > div.mod,
.mod-community-feed .hd .filter-box,
.bubble,
.mod-user-rank-breakdown .bd,
.mod-user-game-analysis .panel,
.mod-filter > .bd,
.mod-community-comments .comment-sort {
    background: none !important;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;
    border-radius: 10px !important;
}
.user-game-list li:first-child .percent-bar,
.feed-items .actions-container,
.feed-items .inline-comment,
.feed-items .inline-comments-round-edge,
.button-icon,
.button-icon:hover,
.boxart-carousel .bd,
.feed-items .inline-comments-container,
.mod-community-comments .topbar,
.mod-object-count .counts-box,
.games-list li.alt,
.result-list,
.mod-get-most .bd,
.feed-items .new .url-section {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;
}
.mod-community-feed .hd .filter-box,
textarea,
.multi-dropdown ul,
#page-head,
.arrow-popup > .inner,
#page_foot .mod-page-foot,
.mod-suggested-people .wtf-help,
#page-head .nav .slidedown-menu,
#page-head .search input,
.typeahead-results,
.mod-site-search .divider,
.feed-items.single .author,
.mod-notifications-list.popup-menu,
.modal-content,
.mod-gametime-tracking select,
form.standard input[type="text"],
.mod-account-basic-info select[name="timezone"],
.mod-account-basic-info .bd form select[name="themeid"] {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8) !important;
}
.tabs-nav .tab-control .active,
.user-game-list li .percent-bar,
.mod-major > .hd > .tab-control li.active,
.mod-standard > .hd > .tab-control li.active {
    background-color: rgba(75,75,75,1) !important;
}
.mod-recently-played .more-info-container,
.mod-follow,
.mod-profile-title,
.mod-profile-about {
    border-color: rgb(170,170,170)!important;
    border-style: solid !important;
    border-width: 1px !important;
}
.hd h3,
.mod-profile-about h3,
.mod-sidebar .hd,
.mod-your-stats h4,
.mod-recently-played .game-head-container a,
textarea,
.feed-items h4.has-desc,
.feed-items .author-line a,
.feed-items .multi-dropdown li,
.button-icon,
.mod-user-game-breakdown h3,
.user-games-list .achievement-link,
.mod-major > .hd > .tab-control li.active,
.pagination-bar em,
.list-selector .selectors li em,
.feed-items .url-section h5 a,
.feed-items .url-section .domain,
.feed-items .stats button .text,
.feed-items h4 a,
.feed-items .stats a .text,
.mod-object-count h3,
.mod-related-stories .title,
.mod-related-stories a.button.text-icon,
.mod-community-comments .sort-list select,
.mod-object-count .count,
.mod-community-comments .item .actions-container > .actions button,
.feed-object-comments .stats button .text,
.mod-top-comments .stats button .text,
.mod-top-comments h3,
#page-head .search input,
.mod-site-search .divider,
.mod-site-search .footer .meta,
.mod-notifications-list .foot a,
.mod-standard > .hd > .tab-control li.active,
.result-list .item .follow-count,
.mod-invite-friends .social-invite .text,
.mod-open-inviter.sidebar h3,
form.standard input[type="text"],
.user-game-stats .hours a,
.user-game-stats .achievements a {
    color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;
    text-shadow: none !important;
}
.encouragement,
.mod-recently-played .game-ranking .cta,
.region-child > div.mod,
.bio,
.mod-sidebar .bd,
.mod-community-feed .hd .filter-box,
p.stat,
.feed-items .author-line,
.feed-items .stat,
.feed-items .feed-body,
.arrow-popup > .inner,
.arrow-popup > .inner span,
.mod-user-game-breakdown .desc,
.user-games-list .game-details strong,
.mod-filter .checkbox-list li,
.mod-major > .hd > .tab-control li,
.pagination-bar,
.list-selector label,
.list-selector .selectors li,
.feed-items .has-thumbnail p,
.feed-items .comment-container .comment-body,
.mod-community-carousel .last-updated,
.feed-items .inline-desc,
.feed-items .url-section,
.mod-community-about .wrapper *,
.mod-suggested-people button.text-icon,
.feed-items .url-section p,
.mod-object-count .count-label,
.feed-items .posted-in,
.mod-community-comments .item .author-level-topic,
.mod-top-comments .comment-item .comment,
.mod-notifications-list .item .blurb,
.mod-notifications-list .item p,
.mod-notifications-list > .bd .no-data,
.new-releases .item .releases-in,
.games-list .stats,
.mod-gametime-tracking .note,
.mod-gametime-tracking select,
.mod-get-most .actions label,
.mod-invite-friends label,
.mod-suggested-people .in-common button.text,
.mod-account-basic-info select[name="timezone"],
.mod-account-basic-info .bd form > ul > li > label,
.mod-account-basic-info .bd form select[name="themeid"],
.user-game-stats li.achievements .possible {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;
}
.has-desc a {
    color: rgb(255, 167, 58) !important;
}
}
